title: Math.expm1()
description: The `Math.expm1()` static JS method returns `e` (Euler's number), approximately 2.718, raised to the power of a given number, minus one.
content: The static method that returns `e` (Euler's number), approximately 2.718, raised to the power of a given number minus one. It's useful for computing values close to zero more accurately than `Math.exp(x) - 1`.
